comment: /**  * Get one of the 14 standard fonts by base font name.  *  * @param fontName the base font name, such as {@code "Helvetica"} or {@code "Helvetica-Bold"}  * @return the {@link PDType1Font} or null, of the {@code fontName} is not mapped to any font  */
code: /**  * Get one of the 14 standard fonts by base font name.  *  * @param fontName the base font name, such as {@code "Helvetica"} or {@code "Helvetica-Bold"}  * @return the {@link PDType1Font} or null, of the {@code fontName} is not mapped to any font  */ public static PDType1Font getByName(String fontName) {     return FONTS_BY_NAME.get(fontName). }
